name: Assessment 2 - Greybox Project (hollsteina)
description:
Directions:

Click and navigate your way through the menu. To play the game hit 'PLAY' on the Main Menu. To navigate back to the Main Menu hit 'Main Menu' in the top left corner.

Click on the buttons located in the Controls menu to manipulate the player object. You will be able to rotate, move and change the size of the object.

To reset to defaults click the 'Reset' button.

Please feel free to give me some feedback on how to improve this greybox project.

Submission of Assessment 2 for PROG2001.

Adrian Hollstein - Team Alpha
